rpgonline.world

Class ABTNetWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpgonline.world.chunk.ChunkWorld
      • rpgonline.world.ABTNetWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    World

    public class ABTNetWorld
extends ChunkWorld
    A world that stores ABT data received from the server on the client side.
    Author:
    Tomas
    See Also:
    Client.getRequestedChunks()
